meanings.definition: Not having a disk or disks.
meanings.sent1: The computer lab uses diskless computers to save space.
meanings.sent2: My new laptop is diskless, so I have to store everything online.
meanings.sent3: The diskless computer felt left out among its disk-holding peers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a diskless computer, empty and waiting to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The diskless device was sleek and modern, free from bulky disks.

meanings.sent1: The diskless server was more efficient without the need for physical storage.
meanings.sent2: I prefer a diskless setup for my gaming console to avoid clutter.
meanings.sent3: The diskless computer was the envy of all the other devices.
meanings.sent4: His room looked like a diskless wonderland, clean and organized.
meanings.sent5: The diskless laptop was a revelation in simplicity and speed.
